abstract: China's sovereign wealth fund buys shares of four major banks, with more purchases planned in the coming year, in effort to stem a deep decline in the banks' stock prices.
snippet: An arm of the China Investment Corporation is trying to shore up stocks that have declined because of concerns about possible losses on loans.
lead_paragraph: An arm of the China Investment Corporation is trying to shore up stocks that have declined because of concerns about possible losses on loans.

headline.main: China’s Sovereign Wealth Fund Tries to Bolster Stocks of Major Banks
headline.print_headline: China’s Sovereign Wealth Fund Tries to Bolster Stocks of Major Banks
headline.seo: China’s Sovereign Wealth Fund Buys Shares in Major Banks
